name: Petshopmania
description:
Free the animals and let them go out and enjoy an exciting world!!!
Petshopmania is an addictive and amazing puzzle-game based on a unique concept, which is simple, but a big challenge at the same time. Perfect for all ages.

With more than150 unique puzzles, all of them different, and split into 5 levels (worlds) that gradually increases difficulty, Petshopmania guarantees you a bunch of hours of puzzling fun!

HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the stars -- trying to rotate a piece may be a better approach to earn all the stars!!
